requirement: This code is intended to implement a mapping logic that translates modbus logical addresses into local physical indices, specifying the level (sky or ground), direction (extend or retract), and corresponding physical index for different sections and logical indices.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK mdbsLogicToPhy	//modbus华中挡板地址编号对应本地索引编号
VAR_INPUT
	section		:INT;	//区域限定 1:skyExt, 2:skyRet, 3:grdExt, 4:grdRet)
	lgcIdx		:INT;	//华中对应的地址	10,14{1..10}  17,20{1..11}
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	level		:INT;	//1->地轨	2->天轨
	phyIdx		:INT;	//内存物理地址对应数组索引
	direct		:TargetDirect;
END_VAR
